nodes.text: The SFS L-s7.2 laser cannon were mass produced in the Wakeelmui system, and were considered the standard laser cannon used on Sienar Fleet Systems's TIE Series around the time of the Battle of Endor.
The SFS L-s7.2 offered a low recycle time meaning higher rates of fire. It improved on the L-s1 laser cannons power.
Besides being fitted onto TIE craft throughout the history of the Galactic Empire, a modified version of the weapon was used on Chiss clawcraft.
